scripts.rename-files: mv buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-activity-post-form.js buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-activity-post-form.min.js && mv buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-activity.js buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-activity.min.js && mv buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-nouveau.js buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-nouveau.min.js && mv buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-activity-post-form.js.map buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-activity-post-form.min.js.map && mv buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-activity.js.map buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-activity.min.js.map && mv buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-nouveau.js.map buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-nouveau.min.js.map && sed -i -E 's|//# sourceMappingURL=(.+)\\.js\\.map|//# sourceMappingURL=\\1.min.js.map|g' buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-activity-post-form.min.js && sed -i -E 's|//# sourceMappingURL=(.+)\\.js\\.map|//# sourceMappingURL=\\1.min.js.map|g' buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-activity.min.js && sed -i -E 's|//# sourceMappingURL=(.+)\\.js\\.map|//# sourceMappingURL=\\1.min.js.map|g' buddyboss-timeline_files/buddypress-nouveau.min.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx parcel build && npm run rename-files
